en_comments: We are operating at 80% supply allocation until further notice. This will ensure equitable access for patients and mitigate any potential supply constraints for wholesalers and hospitals. If you require urgent assistance regarding Cathflo supply please contact Order and Distribution Management: mississauga.order_mgmt@roche.com or through the CPDN portal.
fr_comments: La répartition de notre approvisionnement est de 80 % jusqu’à nouvel ordre, et ce, afin de garantir un accès équitable aux patients et d’atténuer toute contrainte potentielle en matière d’approvisionnement pour les grossistes et les hôpitaux. Si vous avez une urgence concernant l’approvisionnement de Cathflo, veuillez contacter le service des commandes à mississauga.order_mgmt@roche.com ou via le portail du CPDN.

en_comments:
Depending on the desired use of the product, Baxter Corporation offers the Fibrin Sealant products.

In addition to the Fibrin Sealant options, Baxter also offers other alternative products for
hemostasis, sealing or tissue adherence. It is recommended that customers contact their local Baxter Advanced Surgery Representative to discuss their specific clinical needs to determine the best possible alternative for their practice.”

Depending on the desired use of the product, Baxter Corporation offers the Fibrin Sealant products.

hemostasis, sealing or tissue adherence. It is recommended that customers contact their local Baxter Advanced Surgery Representative to discuss their specific clinical needs to determine the best possible alternative for their practice.”

shortage_reason.en_reason: Delay in shipping of the drug.
shortage_reason.fr_reason: Retard dans l’expédition du médicament

en_comments: Fresenius Kabi Canada regrets to advise that due to shipping delays, we will be encountering a supply interruption on our Tobramycin for Injection 1.2 g powder PBP Vial 50 mL effective June 1, 2024 until July 5, 2024. During this time, our Tobramycin Injection 40 mg/mL MD Vial 30 mL is available for substitution.
fr_comments: Fresenius Kabi Canada a le regret de vous informer qu’en raison de retards d’expédition, sa présentation de Tobramycine pour injection 1,2 g, flacon GFP, 50 mL sera en situation d’interruption d’approvisionnement du  1 juin 2024 au 5 juillet 2024. Au cours de cette période, notre présentation de Tobramycine injectable 40 mg/mL, fiole DM, 30 mL sera disponible en guise de substitut.
